name: Ticket on Rails
overview:
Being a startup ourselves, we know how precious time is for you so we developed our tool delivering a simple experience to reduce the learning curve to zero.

Integrating your help desk with Ticket on Rails is incredibly simple. As soon as you register we provide you an email address to manage your customer enquiries, you don’t need to write a single line of code, it’s just as easy as that.

Ticket on Rails comes with a lot of awesome features, such as: multiple agents, ticket prioritization, automated replies, chat room, real time events, live stats and if you think this is not enough we are ready to accommodate any request with an extensive API.

It takes less than a minutes to get your Ticket on Rail up and running, don’t waste your time, try it now!
